item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

The Soul:

Create a var and make it save to / load from the characters’ file. When declaring, set it to default (0 for integers, false for booleans) and check with an if statement if the var is false. Under that if statement you can set the var to 1 for the integer or true for boolean.

how should i do that ?

item.title: Realy need help [317]
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

ok so i got a code for a special zone for my server but when i click on the box that should give the item it gives the item. but i want that when it haves a marionet it stop giving items.
as far i got this code but when i’m online it keeps giving me the parts.

if(objectID == 13634){ if(playerHasItem(995, 100000000)) deleteItem(995, 100000000); toX = 2007; toY = 4431; heightLevel = 0; sendInterface("You teleported to the marionet zone!!"); } else { sM("You need 100 mil to go to the puppet zone!"); } if(objectID == 10687){ addItem(6876, 1); sendInterface("You receive a puppet torso."); } if(objectID == 10687){ if(playerHasItem(6868)) sendInterface("You only can have one puppet!"); } if(objectID == 10686){ if(playerHasItem(6876)) deleteItem(6876, 1); addItem(6877, 1); sendInterface("You receive puppet arms."); } else { sM("You need an puppet torso."); } if(objectID == 10686){ if(playerHasItem(6868)) sendInterface("You only can have one puppet!"); } if(objectID == 10689){ if(playerHasItem(6877)) deleteItem(6877, 1); addItem(6878, 1); sendInterface("You receive puppet legs."); } else { sM("You need puppet arms and the torso."); } if(objectID == 10689){ if(playerHasItem(6868)) sendInterface("You only can have one puppet!"); } if(objectID == 10688){ if(playerHasItem(6878)) deleteItem(6878, 1); addItem(6868, 1); sendInterface("You receive a blue marionet."); } else { sM("You need puppet arms, the torso and the legs."); } if(objectID == 10687){ if(playerHasItem(6868)) sendInterface("You only can have one puppet!"); }

Read full topic
